actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution providing that the House agree, with amendments, to the Senate amendment to the text; and agree to the Senate amendment to the title to H.R. 1337, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the excise tax on certain trucks, buses, tractors, et cetera.

summary.text: Resolves that the House of Representatives agrees, with amendments, to Senate amendments to H.R. 1337, a bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the manufacturers' excise tax on heavy buses, trucks, and bus and truck bodies and chassis.

titles.title: A resolution providing that the House agree, with amendments, to the Senate amendment to the text; and agree to the Senate amendment to the title to H.R. 1337, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the excise tax on certain trucks, buses, tractors, et cetera.
